name: Hotel Mercure Sao Paulo Times Square

reviews.text: I stay in lots of Mercure and other Accor hotels but wouldn't go back to this one.
reviews.title: Noisy

reviews.text: On the plus side: the location is very good, in a pretty safe area with plenty of options nearby for food and drink. Free wifi. OK breakfast (though not special). And it's close to Congonhas airport.
reviews.title: Great choice

reviews.text: On the down side: proximity to the airport means planes (depending on direction of landing/take-off) pass directly overhead and there's not enough soundproofing to keep the noise out. So as of 6 in the morning ....
reviews.title: excellent localization and price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: confortable stay, nice staff good location and no comments at all
reviews.title: Mercure out 2010

reviews.text: This is not a hotel so keep that in mind. Reception is manned but there are no other facilities. There is a small coffee bar but that's it. The apartment is grubby and passages dim, the area seems unsafe. There are few cafes and bars nearby. I' sure there are better places to stay.
reviews.title: Not good at all, give it a miss

reviews.text: The hotel is excelent... I have already used lots of hotels in this area, and can assure that a very good option. Today I live in Sao Paulo some blocks away from this hotel.. It´s locations is perfect, the Moema Neighbourhood is full of pubs, restaurants., and 15 minutes from Congonhas Airport...
reviews.title: Excelent cost x benefits in Moema Neighbourhood

aka: Hotel Mercure Sao Paulo Times Square Brazil
description: Established in 2000, the Mercure Apartments Sao Paulo Times Square is located in South Central Sao Paulo. It offers 3-star air-conditioned rooms and a stylish restaurant.Guests of the Mercure Apartments Sao Paulo Times Square can enjoy a dip in the outdoor pool or visit the fitness centre. It also features a sauna, a 24 hour reception and a safe. Additional features include laundry facilities and a hair salon.The rooms at the Mercure Apartments Sao Paulo Times Square feature cable / satellite channels, a kitchenette and a flat-screen TV. A hair dryer, a private bathroom and complimentary toiletries can be found in each room of the hotel. Standard inclusions to the bathroom are towels and a rain shower.The Mercure Apartments Sao Paulo Times Square is situated less than 10 minutes' drive from Congonhas-Sao Paulo Airport (CGH).
